summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeColourPop's Fresh Kiss Lip Mask replenishes and locks in lasting moisture for soft, kissable lips with a yummy flavor. Infused with lip-loving raspberry seed oil, cloudberry oil, and shea butter, this cushiony formula melts onto lips for a plump, pillowy pout with a glossy glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating leave-on lip maskSoftens, replenishes & nourishes dry lipsLeaves lips feeling pillowy-soft overnightSuper cushiony feelNon-sticky glossy glowFeaturesYummy strawberry flavorKey IngredientsRaspberry seed oil moisturizes dry lipsCloudberry oil is rich in vitamins to support healthy lipsShea butter softens rough lipsItem 2642849How To UseApply to lips as needed, day or night.Use before bedtime as an overnight lip treatment.Use after Fresh Kiss Lip Scrub (sold separately) for the perfect lip care routine.IngredientsStrawberry Milk: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Triethylhexanoin, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Flavor, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Paraffin, Euphorbia Cerifera Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Saccharin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Rubus Chamaemorus Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850).
how_to_use: Apply to lips as needed, day or night.Use before bedtime as an overnight lip treatment.Use after Fresh Kiss Lip Scrub (sold separately) for the perfect lip care routine.

reviews.headline: Love this!!
reviews.comments: It's a thick enough formula that hydrates my lips overnight! I love the smell too!

reviews.headline: Smells amazing
reviews.comments: This works pretty good and each one has a great smell to it. I prefer a lip mask that will reduce the lines in my lips versus adding just shine and moisture. To give credit, I will say it works as a great moisturizer.

reviews.headline: DO NOT buy the jelly donut one
reviews.comments: The jelly donut one smells like hair build-up

reviews.headline: Jelly donut
reviews.comments: I usually dont like scented lip products but the jelly donut is so good!! Wasnt a fan of the strawberry milk.

reviews.headline: Delicious formula
reviews.comments: Feels very moisturizing and hydrating. Lips felt supple, I applied day and night, love the Strawberry and Vanilla- delicious!

reviews.headline: MUST TRY!
reviews.comments: I really enjoyed the lip mask. The formula has this cussion that wow i cant even explain but also lightweight like WOAH , so it hydrates without feeling heavy or greasy. My lips stay moisturized for hours, and I love that I can use it both overnight and during the day. A little goes a long way, DEF can be used with a lip liner! Use bff2. The texture feels so comfortable. Definitely worth it if you're looking for a nourishing lip mask!

reviews.headline: I will buy more! love!!!
reviews.comments: Love this formula! Super hydrating, feels amazing and love the Vanilla flavor!!!

reviews.headline: i wouldn't buy the jelly donut flavour
reviews.comments: in my opinion the jelly donut smells soooooo bad. the other flavor ls might be good but not this one. i wanted it for a dupe but not anymore i will NEVER use the lip mask again.

reviews.headline: It's a perfect product
reviews.comments: I got the pistachio gelato and chocolate milkshake, they both smell so so so good and they are very moisturizing. They are also thick without feeling sticky which is what I look for in a lip mask.

reviews.headline: do NOT buy the purple one
reviews.comments: I was so excited for this lip mask because it looked like a good dupe for a high end product, but I made the unfortunate choice of picking the jelly donut scent. I don't know what kind of jelly donuts the folks over at Colourpop are eating, but this lip mask smells straight up like moldy cheese. It was so bad, I returned it. Hopefully the others smell better because the formula did seem nice. I just couldn't keep it on my lips because the smell was so vile.

reviews.headline: Great product, but do not get the jelly donut one
reviews.comments: Really amazing, maybe not exact dupe level, but a solid lip mask. Whatever you do though do not buy the jelly doughnut. It stinks. Every time I go to use it I dread the smell. It does somewhat go away once it's on your lips, but for the love of God, just don't smell it in the container. I really really like the product. I just hate the smell. That's the only reason I haven't returned it.

reviews.headline: Smell great! EXCEPT the purple one.
reviews.comments: The purple one has a really "off" smell, but the other 3 smell amazing! Chocolate is my fav. Other than that, they work like most other lip masks.

reviews.headline: Strawberry Milk is delightful
reviews.comments: Saw this on my way out and thought I would try it since my lips are always so dry. Absolutely love this lip mask. The strawberry milk smells delightful. I will be buying another to put in my purse.

reviews.headline: Fenty Glow DUPE!!
reviews.comments:
I'm going to keep it simple. Love the Strawberry Milk One! 

Texture: soft on lips, smooth like butter on lips with the hydrating effects of a water cream. 

This is more moisturizing than ELF Rose Envy Lip Gloss which is also a good Fenty dupe.

Scent: strawberries lol

Appearance: juicy, hydrated and healthy full lips (not a plumper) . I am tan-dark skin girly, so as person with two-tone lips I am telling you I love this with and without lip liner. 

A little goes a long way! Just wish there was an applicator.

reviews.headline: Great lip mask
reviews.comments: I love the way my lips feel using this product! It moisturizes so well with a nice shine. Im in lovee!!!

reviews.headline: feels good, smells bad
reviews.comments: this product feels so good on the lips, definitely a dupe for higher end ones, but the purple jelly donut scent is just ATROCIOUS. it literally smells like kraft mac and cheese. every other scent is great except the jelly donut, it straight up is like artificial cheese powder.

reviews.headline: SMELL
reviews.comments: The other flavors smell fine but the jelly donut flavor smells RANCID. It smells like moldy cheese

media.headline: i wouldn't buy the jelly donut flavour
media.caption: horrible smell
